page.title: 05Shouldham-Where people work.
page.content: No longer do all the parents work in the villages or on the land. Most parents now work in King's Lynn or Downham Market. The employers in the villages are farmers,a coach company,petrol station and small builders. The Forestry Commission used to employ a few people, but this is now centred at Thetford Forest. Quite a large number of people work at nearby R.A.F. Marham as personel or in the ancilliary services. Much of the female population does find seasonal work at the orchard in Shouldham Thorpe or by going to pick soft fruit in the Fen area.
